feed.title: Category: Super Mario Advance | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Super Mario Advance (GBA, 2001)
entry.content:
On the plane ride, I played this for a bit after my son fell asleep. I was hoping he'd play it but he is having a hard time learning to run in a direction and doesn't have the patience yet.

When I played, I got to the Birdo in 7-1 but didn't beat it. I took the warps in 1-2 and 4-1 and then played through. I got 23% of the game done. I think this version is quite a bit easier because of the abundance of extra lives and hearts. But I like the percentage indicator to show how much you've conquered.
